name: Bad Cards: Against Humanity!
description:
Cards Against Humanity is a party game for horrible people. Each round, one player asks a question from a black card, and everyone else answers with their funniest white card.
When a player scores 10 points then the game is over.
Player can either use the question cards or answer cards from the deck or they can create their own.
Cards Against Humanity is best played in party with friends.
Game Cards Against Humanity comes with two modes namely Online and Play with Friends.
Cards Against Humanity game has 200 question cards and 1024 answers cards and also supports custom answers in Cards Against Humanity game
